We are running into issues with the AutoCompleteBox on Windows XP. It works most of the time, but after 5 to 10 minutes we will often see if flake outs. The AutoCompleteBox will basically remained expanded even after tabbing to the next field. The AutoCompleteBox will also now show the actual text in the drop down. The drop down appears to be working, but you can't see the text.

Is anyone using the AutoCompleteBox successfully on Windows XP?
